Test class contains a method similar to 

public static Test suite() { 
    TestSuite suite= new TestSuite(); 
    suite.addTest(new MoneyTest("testMoneyEquals")); 
    suite.addTest(new MoneyTest("testSimpleAdd")); 
    return suite;
}


While using junit.swingui.TestRunner to run tests in such a test 
class, the class junit.framework.TestResult is never used. Then where 
is it used?
What is the need fo this TestResult class.


Is it useful while using Jakarta CActus by any chance???

Thanks,
Payal.
